sentences.en: A typhoon is now approaching Hong Kong.
An airliner came close to disaster while approaching Heathrow Airport.
sentences.cn: 一架大型客机在飞近希思罗机场时差点儿发生空难。

sentences.en: Approaching cars will be routed into two lanes.
sentences.cn: 驶来的车辆会分流到两条车道。

sentences.en: At 60, he was now approaching retirement.
Her finger tightened on the trigger as she heard footsteps approaching.
sentences.cn: 她听到脚步声越来越近,便手指紧扣扳机.

sentences.en: Hurricane Betty is now approaching the coast of Florida.
sentences.cn: 飓风贝蒂正在逼近佛罗里达海岸。

sentences.en: I saw a figure approaching in the darkness.
sentences.cn: 我看见黑暗中有个人影走过来.

sentences.en: Maybe he is shy, so why not show him your confidence and courage by approaching him first?
sentences.cn: 或许他只是害羞，所以为什么不通过主动接近他来向他展示你的自信和勇气呢？

sentences.en: Panic swept through the swimmers as they saw the shark approaching.
sentences.cn: 游泳的人看见鲨鱼靠近时一片惊慌.

sentences.en: That is until Neptune station reports of unidentified spacecraft approaching.
sentences.cn: 这是直到海王星站报告的不明飞船接近。

sentences.en: The approaching tornado struck awe in our hearts.
sentences.cn: 正在逼近的龙卷风使我们惊恐万分.

sentences.en: The business in hand was approaching some kind of climax.
sentences.cn: 手头的生意似乎快到紧要关头了。

sentences.en: The cars had stopped at the sound of the approaching siren.
sentences.cn: 这些汽车听到愈来愈近的警笛声便停了下来.

sentences.en: The sailors took in sail when the tempest was approaching.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨来临之际,水手们将帐篷放下.

sentences.en: There is no other player even remotely approaching her caliber.
sentences.cn: 就才干而言,其他选手远远赶不上她.

sentences.en: Unemployment is rapidly approaching the one million mark.
sentences.cn: 失业人数正迅速逼近百万大关。

sentences.en: We turned to see the approaching car slow down.
sentences.cn: 我们转身看见驶近的车慢慢停下。

sentences.en: You see the plane you have just left, drift into the clouds (if there are any), and the land is far away but approaching rapidly.
sentences.cn: 你看见你刚刚离开的飞机，漂移到云中（如果有云的话），而地面还很遥远但是正在快速接近你当中。

phrases.tran_cn: 学习...的入门；学习...的途径
以…方式处理；向…提出建议
直接法；直接进场；直接接近法
收益法；所得方法；入息计算法
实际的方法；重实效的方法

trans.tran_cn: 接近，走近，靠近( approach的现在分词 )，（在性质、数量、质量、情形、时间等方面）近似，接洽，使移近
